doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 9 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 2/23/1987] [3]--Men and Films, Episode No. 9
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 9 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 2/23/1987] [3]--Men and Films, Episode No. 9

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. Gay Week in Review, with Andy Humm, Darrell Yates Rist, and Tim Coglin 2. Short news stories3. New York Native reports that AIDS caused by syphilis spirochetesCOMMERCIAL: Night of a Thousand Gowns charity drag ball4. Catholic Church ejecting gay groups from their churches and forbidding them to meet or worship thereCOMMERCIAL: "First Hand" gay magazine5. Andy Humm on the marriage of an ex-gay man with AIDS in a Catholic Church6. News Watch, bill introduced in Maryland to remove state's sodomy laws7. LAMBDA legal defense hires a third attorney to full-time staff to deal exclusively with AIDS-related issues8. Chicago, low income gays suffer discrimination at a greater rate and degree9. New York, judge rules that funeral homes charging more for burial of AIDS victims are doing so illegally10. San Francisco, Mayor Diane Feinstein announces a reward for information leading to the arrest of the murderer of two gay men in the city's Castro district in December of 198611. Arizona governor, Evan Mecham, declares that homosexuality is not a valid alternative lifestyle and therefore has no place in any argument concerning human rights12. Sports Report13. Lavender Health, interview with Dr. Joan Waitkevicz of the lesbian-centered St. Marks Women's Health Collective14. Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1. Media Watch with Brandon Judell, interview with William H. Hoffman, playwright of "As Is," with clips of the television filmCOMMERCIAL: Zamir Furs2. Show Bits with George Trahanis, review of "Vicki's Valentine Thing," with clipsCOMMERCIAL: Night of a Thousand Gowns charity drag ball3. Razor Sharp introduces a contest to win a date with herCOMMERCIAL: The Monster4. Closing credits
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 9 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 2/23/1987] [3]--Men and Films, Episode No. 9: February 1987
